General Social Survey (GSS) 2022 Data

Source: R/data_gss.R
gss.Rd

Subset of data from the General Social Survey 2022 Individual Year Data Sets. For more information, visit: https://gss.norc.org/us/en/gss/get-the-data/spss.html.

Usage

gss

Format

A tibble with 4,149 rows and 40 columns:

id

Respondent identification number

year

Year of interview

dateintv

Date of interview

age

Respondent's age in years

sexnow1

Respondent's current sex

hispanic

Respondent's Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origins

race

Respondent's race

marital

Respondent's marital status

agekdbrn

Age at birth of first child

educ

Highest year of school completed

relig

Religious affiliation

wrkstat

Labor force status

nataid

Attitudes towards: Foreign aid

nataidy

Attitudes towards: Assistance to other countries:Ver Y

natarms

Attitudes towards: Military, armaments, and defense

natarmsy

Attitudes towards: National defense:Version Y

natchld

Attitudes towards: Assistance for childcare

natcity

Attitudes towards: Solving problems of big cities

natcityy

Attitudes towards: Assistance to big cities:Version Y

natcrime

Attitudes towards: Halting rising crime rate

natcrimy

Attitudes towards: Law enforcement:Version Y

natdrug

Attitudes towards: Dealing with drug addiction

natdrugy

Attitudes towards: Drug rehabilitation:Version Y

nateduc

Attitudes towards: Improving nations education system

nateducy

Attitudes towards: Education:Version Y

natenrgy

Attitudes towards: Developing alternative energy sources

natenvir

Attitudes towards: Improving & protecting environment

natenviy

Attitudes towards: The environment:Version Y

natfare

Attitudes towards: Welfare

natfarey

Attitudes towards: Assistance to the poor:Version Y

natheal

Attitudes towards: Improving & protecting nations health

nathealy

Attitudes towards: Health:Version Y

natmass

Attitudes towards: Mass transportation

natpark

Attitudes towards: Parks and recreation

natrace

Attitudes towards: Improving the conditions of Black people

natracey

Attitudes towards: Assistance to Black people: version y

natroad

Attitudes towards: Highways and bridges

natsci

Attitudes towards: Supporting scientific research

natsoc

Attitudes towards: Social security

natspac

Attitudes towards: Space exploration program

natspacy

Attitudes towards: Space exploration:Version Y
